_sText:
Bomb/Defuse map based on the famous Combat Arms' map (Junk Flea).

Map: An important junkyard placed in the south of 
California. The place reduce junk and recicle them
to use it in shotguns shells. This place is the only
provider of this recicled plastic to make shells. If 
the recicle cycle stops by any reason, shotguns will
need to be removed from the US Army.


Terrorists: destroy the electrical center in order
to make the factory stop working and prevent
terrorists from all over the world being killed by
the US shotguns.


Counter Terrorists: prevent Terrorists get inside the 
electrical system.


Tip: the electrical center is next to the Counter 
Terrorists Spawn with two red lights.



Instalation: extract and replace the maps folder in your cstrike directory.


For this map i used the '8 theory' of mapping: the map is an eight (refeer to the last screenshot).



Please give good feedback.
